short_summary: The ISC Program has a requirement for the services of:
description: Providing the services of two dedicated resources, technical writers and business analysts, to support the priorities of the ISC program.
full_summary:
I invite you to submit a request-for-proposal for innovative solutions to support the Industry Canada's activities.
### Notice Details

| **Property**         | **Value**                                                                                                            |
| :------------------- | :---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Title               | Advisory Services for Innovation Canada Program Delivery and Coordination Services                                 |
| Reference Number    | PW-23-01024640                                                                                                  |
| Solicitation Number | ISED-205145                                                                                                      |
| Publication Date     | 2023-02-03                                                                                                         |
| Tender Closing Date | 2023-03-06T 10:00:00                                                                                           |
| Expected Contract Duration | This is a one-time tender.                                                                                                                                                                    |

### Notice Description

Industry Canada invites suppliers to submit a proposal to provide advisory services for program delivery and coordination of Innovation Canada. We seek expressions of interest from experienced and expert technical writers, business analysts, and project coordinators who can help with developing Statements of Work (SOW), business analysis, and market research.

The successful bidder will provide up to two dedicated resources to work on-site or remotely, either on a full-time basis or based on demand.

The purpose of this notice is to attract suppliers who can execute the following tasks:

1.  Lead or coordinate the development of SOW;
2.  Support GC departments in leveraging the Innovation Hub and ISC program;
3.  Conduct research and business analysis to support the priorities of the ISC program.

### Selection Criteria

We do not require the submission of documentation to support the valuation of the selection criteria. This is an open competition, and the evaluation of the proposals will be guided by the evaluation criteria set forth in the solicitation (ISED-205145).

---

Note:
The supplier is expected to have previous experience providing technical writing, business analysis, and project coordination services;  the following is required:

-   *Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)*
- Those who meet this requirement are welcome to submit their proposal- Right of Preference DOS not apply.

Contact:
Marcoux, Nathalie (nathalie.marcoux@ic.gc.ca) (343-291-3849)

### Notice Attachments
You can download the relevant document from-[click here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/03/e08c88c6e6b72c88e54057d656d21ab3/ised205145_-_attachment_2_to_part_1_-_list_of_suppliers.pdf
